name: responsive-mq
author: Keith Jackson
description: Responsive MQ has been designed to enable you to attach JavaScript functions to media queries so you can have viewport specific code executing within your app to partner up with your responsive CSS.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run ensure-dir && npm run uglify && cp README.md ./dist/ && cp package.json ./dist/
scripts.release: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run publish-to-npm && npm run build-tar-for-github
